head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths BELL, STANLEY B.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths BELL, STANLEY B.

block.p: BELL-Stanley B. Beloved husband of Jacqueline. Devoted father of Craig (Kathy), the late Scott, Joanne (Steven), Candi (Allen), Renee, Adrienne (Scott). Adored grandfather of Jeffrey, Rachel, Erin, Justin, Aaron, Elena and Jake. Also survived by two loving sisters, Mildred Bialor and Leona Redston (Dr. Robert), and three devoted companions. Services today, 1 PM, at ''Gutterman's,'' 8000 Jericho Turnpike, Woodbury, LI.
